item.title: 破产的 Steward Health 出售旗下医院，披露 90 亿美元债务
item.description: 破产企业 Steward Health Care 的律师周二在休斯顿举行的法庭听证会上表示，Steward Health Care 已将其在美国的 31 家医院全部出售，希望在夏季结束前完成交易，以解决其 90 亿美元的负债总额问题。【原文：Bankrupt Steward Health Care has put all of its 31 U.S. hospitals up for sale, hoping to finalize transactions by the end of the summer to address its $9 billion in total liabilities, its attorneys said at a Tuesday court hearing in Houston.】

item.title: 约会应用支出下降，Match Group 预计季度收入低于预期
item.description: Tinder 的母公司 Match Group 周二预测第二季度营收将低于华尔街预期，因为用户可能会减少在约会应用上的消费。【原文：Tinder-parent Match Group forecast second-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as users are likely to dial back spending on dating apps.】

item.title: Rivian 坚持年度产量预期，季度亏损扩大
item.description: 电动汽车制造商 Rivian 周二重申了其 2024 年的产量预期，但仍远低于分析师的预期，因为该公司在上个月停产后正集中精力重启生产，以升级装配线并降低成本。 Rivian第一季度亏损扩大，盘后交易股价下跌约2%。【原文：Electric-vehicle maker Rivian on Tuesday reiterated its 2024 production forecast, keeping it well below analysts' expectations, as it focuses on restarting production after a shutdown last month to upgrade its assembly line and reduce costs. Shares of Rivian, which reported a wider first-quarter loss, were down about 2% in after-hours trading.】

item.title: Reddit 收入超过预期
item.description: Reddit 周二发布了作为上市公司的首份财报，凭借强劲的用户增长和广告市场的回暖，季度营收超过预期。【原文：Reddit beat quarterly revenue estimates on Tuesday in its first earnings as a public company, riding on strong user growth and an uptick in the advertising market.】

item.title: 随着打车需求回升，Lyft 预计季度盈利强劲
item.description: 受服务需求强劲以及新用户和司机功能带来的好处推动，打车公司 Lyft 周二预计，本季度的总预订量和核心利润将高于预期。【原文：Ride-hailing company Lyft projected higher-than-expected gross bookings and core profit for the current quarter on Tuesday, driven by robust demand for its services and benefits from new user and driver features.】

item.title: Meta 将为广告提供更多人工智能图像生成服务
item.description: Facebook 和 Instagram 的母公司 Meta Platforms 周二表示，该公司正在扩展其生成式人工智能广告产品套件，提供可自动创建各种图像并在图像上叠加文字的工具。【原文：Meta Platforms , the parent company of Facebook and Instagram, said on Tuesday it was expanding its suite of generative AI ads products to offer tools that can automatically create variations of images and overlay text atop them.】

item.title: 微软遭遇黑客攻击，美国国务院扩大安全供应商名单
item.description: 一位高级官员说，自从去年与中国有关的黑客通过入侵微软的网络窃取了美国国务院数以万计的电子邮件后，美国国务院一直在与微软以外的一系列安全供应商合作。【原文：The U.S. Department of State has been working with a range of security vendors beyond Microsoft since China-linked hackers stole tens of thousands of the department's emails by breaching the tech giant's network last year, a senior official said.】

item.title: 美国撤销中国华为的部分出口许可
item.description: 美国商务部周二表示，它已吊销了一些允许公司向中国手机和笔记本电脑制造商华为运送芯片等货物的许可证。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said on Tuesday it has revoked some licenses that allow companies to ship goods, such as chips, to China's mobile phone and laptop maker Huawei.】

item.title: 亚马逊推出首批电动海港卡车，推动减少尾气排放
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）将于本周二推出其计划今年部署的十几辆沃尔沃（Volvo）电动大卡车中的第一辆，用于从位于加利福尼亚州南部的全美最繁忙的集装箱海港提取货物。【原文：Amazon.com on Tuesday will unveil the first of a dozen Volvo electric big rigs it plans to deploy this year to pick up cargo from the nation's busiest container seaport in southern California.】

item.title: 意大利莱昂纳多公司对波音公司的延误持观望态度
item.description: 意大利莱昂纳多公司首席执行官周二表示，该公司正在等待波音公司最近的麻烦对生产的影响，波音公司可能会在2024年给意大利公司带来约5000万欧元的损失。【原文：Italy's Leonardo is waiting to see the impact of Boeing's recent troubles on production, which could cost the Italian firm some 50 million euros in 2024, the group's CEO said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，皇家加勒比招聘数千人以满足激增的需求
item.description: 邮轮运营商皇家加勒比集团正在与世界各地的新市场和现有市场商讨招聘数千名员工，为其邮轮和私人目的地配备工作人员，以满足创纪录的邮轮需求。【原文：Cruise operator Royal Caribbean Group is in discussions with new and existing markets around the world to recruit thousands of workers to staff its ships and private destinations to keep up with record cruise demand.】

item.title: 微软 Xbox 关闭多个工作室，整合团队以削减成本
item.description: 微软的 Xbox 正在关闭包括 Arkane Austin 在内的多家游戏工作室，成为在游戏市场出现放缓迹象之际关闭工作室的最新一家发行商。【原文：Microsoft's Xbox is shutting down a number of gaming studios including Arkane Austin, making it the latest publisher to shut down studios amid signs of a gaming slowdown.】

item.title: 卡什卡利表示，美联储可能需要全年保持利率稳定
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联储主席尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周二表示，部分受房地产市场走强提振而停滞不前的通胀意味着，美联储将需要在 "较长一段时间内 "保持借贷成本稳定，甚至可能全年保持稳定。【原文：Stalled inflation buoyed in part by housing market strength means the Federal Reserve will need to hold borrowing costs steady for an "extended period," and possibly all year, Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Robinhood 将公布自备忘录股票狂潮以来最高的季度收入
item.description: 交易应用 Robinhood Markets 预计将公布近三年来最高的季度收入，这主要得益于股市和加密货币交易的稳步反弹。【原文：Trading app Robinhood Markets is expected to report its highest quarterly revenue in nearly three years, helped by a steady rebound in equity markets and crypto trading.】

item.title: 研究显示，19% 的美国零售商商品中发现违禁中国棉花
item.description: 一项研究显示，在去年美国零售商销售的商品样本中，有 19% 发现了违禁中国棉花的痕迹，这凸显了遵守美国旨在阻止进口与中国强迫劳动有关的棉花的法律所面临的挑战。【原文：Traces of banned Chinese cotton were found in 19% of a sample of merchandise selling at U.S. retailers in the past year, a study showed, highlighting the challenges of complying with the U.S. law aimed at blocking imports of cotton linked to forced labor in China.】

item.title: 投资者对美国大麻 ETF 持谨慎态度，尽管近期有所反弹
item.description: 尽管追踪北美大麻公司股票的交易所交易基金（ETF）今年表现强劲，但新提出的联邦大麻管理条例迄今为止仍未能激发新的购买兴趣。【原文：New proposed federal rules governing marijuana has so far failed to spark fresh buying interest in exchange traded funds (ETFs) tracking the shares of North American cannabis companies, despite strong performance this year.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利指出通胀 "尘埃落定 "风险高
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联储主席尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）在周二发表的一篇新文章中表示，美国房地产市场的强劲以及通胀进展可能停滞不前，意味着货币政策可能并不像美联储官员们认为的那样紧缩，这提高了物价压力 "稳定 "在高于美联储2%目标水平的可能性。【原文：The strength of the U.S. housing market and potentially stalled progress on inflation means monetary policy may not be as tight as Federal Reserve officials think it is, Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari said in a new essayon Tuesday that raises the possibility price pressures are "settling" to a level above the Fed's 2% target.】

item.title: 美国调查发现联邦存款保险公司普遍存在性行为不端问题
item.description: 周二发布的一份令人震惊的独立报告称，联邦存款保险公司必须进行全面改革，以解决广泛存在的性骚扰和其他不当行为，该报告对银行业监管机构领导层的未来提出了质疑。【原文：The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation must make sweeping changes to address widespread sexual harassment and other misconduct, according to a damning independent report released on Tuesday which raises questions about the future of the banking regulator's leadership.】

item.title: TikTok和ByteDance起诉阻止美国法律要求出售或禁用应用程序
item.description: TikTok 及其中国母公司字节跳动周二表示，他们已向美国联邦法院提起诉讼，寻求阻止乔-拜登总统签署的一项法律，该法律将强制剥离有 1.7 亿美国人使用的短视频应用或禁止使用该应用。【原文：TikTok and its Chinese parent company ByteDance said on Tuesday they filed suit in U.S. federal court seeking to block a law signed by President Joe Biden that would force the divestiture of the short video app used by 170 million Americans or ban its use.】

item.title: 联邦存款保险公司的格伦伯格在对工作场所行为进行 "清醒 "审查后誓言改革
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation）主席马丁-格伦伯格（Martin Gruenberg）周二告诉该机构的工作人员，对该机构文化的外部审查对其工作场所产生了 "令人警醒的看法"，其中包括数以百计的虐待指控。【原文：U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation Chairman Martin Gruenberg told agency staff Tuesday that an external review of the agency's culture yielded a "sobering look" at the workplace, including hundreds of allegations of mistreatment.】

item.title: 美国联邦储备委员会对布特第一公民银行采取执法行动--声明
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会在周二的一份声明中表示，该委员会已对蒙大拿州布特第一公民银行采取执法行动。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve Board has issued an enforcement action with First Citizens Bank of Butte in Montana, the board said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国劳工委员会裁定，苹果公司讯问纽约市工人有关工会运动的问题是非法的
item.description: 联邦劳工委员会在涉及这家科技巨头的首次裁决中裁定，苹果公司曼哈顿一家零售店的经理询问一名员工是否支持工会活动，违反了美国劳动法。【原文：The manager of an Apple Inc retail store in Manhattan violated U.S. labor law by asking an employee whether he supported a union campaign, a federal labor board has ruled in its first decision involving the tech giant.】

item.title: 美国消费者监督机构因 Chime 公司拖延退款罚款 325 万美元
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局（CFPB）周二表示，数字银行 Chime 因未能及时向关闭账户的客户退款，将向该局支付 325 万美元的罚款，并将向客户返还至少 130 万美元。【原文：Digital bank Chime will pay a penalty of $3.25 million to the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) for failing to issue timely refunds to customers who closed their accounts, and will return at least $1.3 million to customers, the regulator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国公用事业公司 Sempra 第一季度利润下降 17
item.description: 美国电力和天然气公用事业公司 Sempra 周二公布的第一季度利润下降了 17%，这主要是受两家公司盈利下降的影响。【原文：U.S. power and gas utility Sempra posted a 17% drop in its first-quarter profit on Tuesday, impacted by lower earnings at two of its units.】

item.title: 智利央行称经济正在复苏，但部分行业发展滞后
item.description: 智利中央银行在周二的一份报告中说，智利经济正在广泛复苏，尽管一些行业发展滞后，金融市场深度尚未恢复到冠状病毒大流行前的水平。【原文：Chile's central bank said in a report on Tuesday that the economy is broadly recovering, though some sectors have lagged and financial market depth has not yet returned to levels seen before the coronavirus pandemic.】

item.title: 饱受通胀之苦的阿根廷推出面值仅为 10 美元的新版顶级钞票
item.description: 阿根廷有了新的最大钞票--10,000 比索，其大小是以前最大钞票的五倍，但仍只值 10 美元左右，因为这个南美国家正在努力应对接近 300% 的世界最高通胀率。【原文：Argentina has a new largest banknote, the 10,000 peso, which is five times the size of the previous top bill but still only worth around $10 as the South American country grapples with the world's highest inflation rate that is nearing 300%.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商在欧洲生产汽车的计划
item.description: 中国是世界上最大的汽车市场，在国内需求放缓的情况下，一些中国汽车制造商正寻求在欧洲建立制造和组装工厂，以期在该地区增加低成本汽车的销售，与欧洲竞争对手一较高下。【原文：Some Chinese carmakers are looking to set up manufacturing and assembly plants in Europe as they aim to ramp up sales in the region of lower costs cars to rival their European competitors amid slowing demand at home, the world's largest car market.】

item.title: 吉利与 Foretellix 合作启动自动驾驶汽车开发
item.description: 中国汽车制造商吉利和以色列汽车安全技术初创公司 Foretellix 周二表示，双方建立了战略合作伙伴关系，以加快自动驾驶汽车的安全大规模开发。【原文：Chinese automaker Geely and Israeli auto safety technology startup Foretellix formed a strategic partnership to accelerate safe large-scale development of self-driving vehicles, the two companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: OpenAI 将推出检测《达利3》图像的工具
item.description: 在人们日益担心人工智能生成的内容会影响今年的全球大选之际，这家由微软支持的初创公司周二表示，OpenAI 正在推出一款工具，可以检测由其文本到图像生成器 DALL-E 3 生成的图像。【原文：OpenAI is launching a tool that can detect images created by its text-to-image generator DALL-E 3, the Microsoft-backed startup said on Tuesday amid rising worries about the influence of AI-generated content in this year's global elections.】

item.title: Instacart 与优步合作，为美国客户提供食品配送服务
item.description: Instacart和Uber Eats周二表示，作为两家公司合作的一部分，Instacart的用户现在可以使用杂货配送平台的应用程序向全美数十万Uber Eats餐厅合作伙伴订餐。【原文：Instacart customers will now be able to use the grocery delivery platform's app to order from hundreds of thousands of Uber Eats restaurant partners across the U.S., as part of a partnership between the two companies, they said on Tuesday.】
